com.gl.vn.me.ko.pies.base.config.app

Interface ConfigLocator


  • @ThreadSafe
public interface ConfigLocator
    Provides a way to access Application's configs located in Configs Location.

    Note that the Application Config SHOULD NOT be located via this API. In order to access Application Config request injection of ApplicationConfig.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PropsConfig getXmlPropsConfig(String configFileShortName)
      Finds configuration specified by the configFileShortName, reads, validates if possible and creates a new PropsConfig that represents configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • getXmlPropsConfig

        PropsConfig getXmlPropsConfig(String configFileShortName)
                       throws ConfigCreationException
        Finds configuration specified by the configFileShortName, reads, validates if possible and creates a new PropsConfig that represents configuration.
        Parameters:
        configFileShortName - Name of the XML configuration file without other path parts. E.g. "applicationConfig.xml".
        Returns:
        A newly constructed PropsConfig that represents the requested configuration.
        Throws:
        ConfigCreationException - If creation of configuration is failed.
